transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Thanks for calling pit. At Point Orthopedics part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Yes, that's me.
Got it. Can you please provide your day of birth?
Got It Felix? How may I help you today?
I'm looking for a restaurant recommendation.
That's not something we offer. I can help with general questions about the Clinic appointments patient, cases medications, refill and insurance.
Can you recommend a nearby restaurant instead?
I'm not able to provide restaurant recommendations. If you have any questions about your Orthopedic care or appointments? I can help with that.
I would like to book a follow-up appointment.
Got it for your follow-up appointment. Do you have a preferred provider or day? And time in mind? We have openings this week and early next week.
I don't have a preferred provider, but I would like an appointment this week.

Understood let me check available, follow-up appointments with any provider for this week. 1 moment, while I fetch the options we have follow-up appointments available, this Tuesday, February 24th with Dr. Do the Howser?
Okay, I'll wait.
No problem, just let me know when you're ready to pick a time or if you have any questions about the appointments.
Can I get an appointment for this week instead?
I'm not sure I understand. Are you asking to book a follow-up appointment for this weekend? Or is this about something else?
I would like to book a follow-up appointment for this week, not on Tuesday.
Currently the only available follow-up appointments, this week are on Tuesday, February 24th.
Can I get on a waitlist for this week?

I can't add you to a wait list directly, but I can let the clinic support team know, you'd like a follow-up appointment. This week, if something opens up, would you like me to document your request for the team to contact you? If an earlier slot becomes available,
Yes, please document my request for the team to contact me if an earlier slot becomes available.

Your request has been documented, the klitik staff will review your case and contact you if an earlier appointment opens up or if a wait-list is possible, is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you.
